item.title: A newbie's guide to querying Wikidata
item.description: After reading one of Jes√∫s Barrasa’s recent QuickGraph posts about enriching a knowledge graph with data from Wikidata, I wanted to learn how to query the Wikidata API so that I could pull in the data for my own QuickGraphs. I want to look up information about tennis players, and one of my favourite players is Nick Kyrgios, so this blog post is going to be all about him.
